modName: Skyrim HD Mountain Textures and Normal Maps 2048x2048
summary: Mountain Textures in HD with Normal Maps.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first texture mod ever so any constructive criticism would be much appreciated.  I took several screenshots of night and day comparisons with vanilla and modified textures to show the new normal maps and textures.  The textures are 2048x2048.  Hope you enjoy.

(EDIT: The original has now been replaced with version 1.1.  Color adjustments have been made and the textures themselves have been redone to better fit the terrain, and offer a more realistic and mountainous look.)
author: mrmysery
